ticket.title: Nextest mandate: remove cargo-test fallbacks across all call paths; enforce caps; propagate env into bounded runner

in_scope: Remove ALL cargo-test fallbacks (pipeline + local) and require explicit `cargo nextest run ...`.
Fail closed if nextest missing in default mode.
Enforce test caps: timeout ≤600s and MemoryMax ≤24G unless explicit unsafe override.
Set `NEXTEST_TEST_THREADS` and `CARGO_BUILD_JOBS` based on lane policy.
Update bounded runner env allowlist to pass: `CARGO_TARGET_DIR`, `CARGO_BUILD_JOBS`, `NEXTEST_TEST_THREADS`, `CARGO_HOME`, `RUSTUP_TOOLCHAIN`.

steps: Unify test command construction in one helper used by both pipeline and local gates.
Add regression tests ensuring nextest is used everywhere.

criteria: Bounded test runner receives and respects computed env knobs.

amendments.summary: Reclassify bounded test controls as containment invariants and decouple default throughput from lane cpu_quota.
supersedes: Set `NEXTEST_TEST_THREADS` and `CARGO_BUILD_JOBS` based on lane policy.
replacement: Set `NEXTEST_TEST_THREADS` and `CARGO_BUILD_JOBS` from host-aware throughput profile defaults.
Containment controls (systemd bounds, timeout, env filtering) remain mandatory fail-closed invariants.
